participant_1.name: Amina
participant_1.personality: Amina is resilient and resourceful, having faced significant challenges in her life. She approaches situations with a strong sense of determination and hope.
participant_1.background: i was forced to marry when i was a teenager. my aunt helped me escape when i was in my early twenties. i was born in somalia. now i live in the united states.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: Ethan is friendly and outgoing, with a love for animals and a knack for storytelling. He enjoys sharing anecdotes about his life and has a playful sense of humor.
participant_2.background: my favorite color is grey. i am terrified of scorpions. i have a german shepherd named barnaby. my father drove a car for nascar. i'm employed by the us postal service.
